list.title: Celebrate the successful opening of Areafly's first store in Cameroon.
list.content: The new store serves as a one-stop hub where customers can explore our full range of solar products, consult with professional sales, and access fast, responsive service.

list.title: The 60kva/125KWH solar system located in Johannesburg, South Africa, has been successfully completed.
list.content: Areafly Solar are well recognized by customers all over the world. Since 2020, We has signed and provided solar street light and power station projects with governments in the world.
